sentences.en: a young executive who has been around.
sentences.cn: 一个经验丰富的年轻经理

sentences.en: All those around him looked at him with amazement.
sentences.cn: 周围的人都对他投射出惊异的眼光。

sentences.en: He had twined his chubby arms around Vincent's neck.
sentences.cn: 他胖乎乎的双臂搂住文森特的脖子。

sentences.en: He wandered around the streets, looking in shop windows.
sentences.cn: 他在街上闲逛，看看商店橱窗。

sentences.en: Jackie was running around with all these brilliant people.
sentences.cn: 杰姬混迹于这些才华横溢的人之间。

sentences.en: My underskirt had ridden up into a thick band around my hips.
sentences.cn: 我的衬裙已经蹿到臀部，厚厚地卷成一圈。

sentences.en: On Sunday Cohen lay around the house all day.
sentences.cn: 科恩星期天一整天都在家无所事事。

sentences.en: Online gaming allows players from around the world to challenge each other.
sentences.cn: 网络游戏使得全球的玩家可以相互较量。

sentences.en: People crowded around to see what was happening.
sentences.cn: 人们挤在四周围观。

sentences.en: She travels con-stantly, moving among her several residences around the world.
sentences.cn: 她经常旅行，穿梭于她在世界各地的多处住所。

sentences.en: She wore a beautiful silk shawl around her shoulders.
sentences.cn: 她在肩上围了一条漂亮的真丝披肩。

sentences.en: Since it’s your first day here, would you like me to show you around?
sentences.cn: 你第一天到这儿，要我带你四处转转吗？

sentences.en: The brothers usually roll into their studio around midday.
sentences.cn: 兄弟几个总是要到正午前后才姗姗来到工作室。

sentences.en: The chalky soil around Saumur produces the famous Anjou wines.
sentences.cn: 索米尔周围的白垩质土壤出产著名的安茹葡萄酒。

sentences.en: The powdery dust rose in a cloud around him.
sentences.cn: 一团粉尘在他周围扬起。

sentences.en: The queues at the door wound around the building.
sentences.cn: 门口的队伍绕了大楼一圈。

sentences.en: The Romans built a defensive wall around the city.
sentences.cn: 罗马人在城市周围筑起一道防御墙。

sentences.en: The shark was writhing around wildly, trying to get free.
sentences.cn: 鲨鱼拼命挣扎，试图逃脱。

sentences.en: The whole family was sitting around the dinner table.
sentences.cn: 全家人围坐在饭桌旁。

sentences.en: There are over 40 radio stations dotted around the country.
sentences.cn: 有40多家广播电台分布在全国各地。

sentences.en: There must have been around 40,000 people in the stadium.
sentences.cn: 体育场里肯定有4万人左右

sentences.en: There were television crews and pressmen from all around the world.
sentences.cn: 来自世界各地的电视工作者和新闻记者齐聚一堂。

sentences.en: They were going to sail around the little island, against the tide.
sentences.cn: 他们打算绕着小岛逆潮航行。

sentences.en: They were knocking around together for about a year.
sentences.cn: 他们交往大概有一年了。

sentences.en: We spent years travelling around in a rusty old van.
sentences.cn: 我们多年来都开着一辆生锈的旧货车四处旅行。

sentences.en: We started looking around for somewhere to live.
sentences.cn: 我们开始到处找住的地方。

sentences.en: We would hear the birds singing all around us.
sentences.cn: 我们会听见四周鸟儿在唱歌。

sentences.en: What an inspiration she was to all around her!
sentences.cn: 她对于她周围所有的人是一种多么大的鼓舞!

sentences.en: When I finished college, I travelled around for a while.
sentences.cn: 大学毕业以后，我到处旅游了一段时间。

phrases.tran_cn: 经验丰富，老于世故：具有丰富经验和不同经历
四处走动；供应；（消息）流传

trans.tran_cn: 大约，四周，围绕，到处，闲散地，出现，走红的，掉头
trans.tran_en: in or to many places or parts of an area

trans.tran_cn: 围绕，从那边，绕过，符合，到处
trans.tran_en: surrounding or on all sides of something or someone
